skeletal.translation[0].definitions[0].d: like a skeleton or relating to a skeleton
skeletal.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Police discovered the skeletal remains of a corpse buried near the river.
skeletal.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who is skeletal is so thin that you can see their bones through their skin
skeletal.translation[0].definitions[1].e: prisoners whose clothes hung loosely on their skeletal bodies
